title: Akali's Smokescreen should damage her.
body:
I don't get it. Smoke is bad for your lungs.
Standing in it for extended periods of time would clearly suffocate a person.
I think it sets a bad example for the youth, as now they'd think "oh well I can throw smokebombs and be invisible" and then choke themselves.

Think of the children, Riot. 
You know that's not realistic.

replies.body:
More likely with  the way RIOT is adding more damage the next buff to Akali:
W now poison enemy  champions  dealing (100*AP+AD) damage over time and slow them.
BUT GRAVES CAN'T HAVE HIS CIGAR DAMN IT!
